# core-spinner

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                           | Type                             | Default    |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Color of the spinner. Use: `color="black"` or `color="red"`. Default size is `"black"`.               | `"black" \| "red"`               | `"black"`  |
| `size`   | `size`    | The pre-defined spinner size. Use: `"small"`, `"medium"`, `"large"`, ect. Default size is `"xlarge"`. | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `"medium"` |
